title: Crime Alert 08.20.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.20.19
description:
Mom takes her son to the hospital over 300 times, but he's perfectly healthy. Drug dealer tries to cash in on the Trump Train. El Paso massacre victim's SUV stolen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
